args:
Determine whether this social media post from Donald Trump contains a personal insult to Kamala Harris's intelligence. Simply return "yes" or "no".
content: RT @LauraLoomerWATCH:ABC News’s Rachel Scott is a rabid, anti-Trump liar and anti-white racist who is attacking President Trump for speaking the Truth about Kamala Harris. Rachel Scott maliciously attacked President Trump over claims that Kamala Harris is a DEI hire while ignoring the words that came out of the mouth of her own Messiah Joe Biden, who said, “To me, the values of Diversity, Equality, Inclusion (DEI) are literally - and this is not kidding - the core strengths of America. That's why I'm proud to have the most diverse administration in history that taps into the full talents of our country. And it starts at the top with the Vice President.” - Joe Biden, Joe Biden proudly declared  Kamala Harris as his own personal DEI hire. It’s on video. See the video for yourself! 👇🏻
